contents.heading: Object-based digital media
contents.content: Media data is decoupled from audio-visual data and 3D meta-data, which represents multiple objects that exist in 3D space, and transmitted to remote locations for the reproduction of 3D space.

contents.heading: Software defined media space
contents.content: The software manages the audio-visual objects in the virtual 3D space and renders images and sounds suitable for the rendering environments.

contents.heading: Internet by design
contents.content: Targeting new research areas and markets involving Internet-by-design audio-visual environments.
